ComicInfo.Penciller: Danny Bulanadi,Frank Miller,Juan Ortiz,Romeo Tanghal,Frank Miller,Danny Bulanadi,Juan Ortiz
ComicInfo.Summary: John W. Kelvin, president of Kelvin Armaments, pays millions to have his scientist Sherlaw build him a suspended animation device. When nuclear war in inevitable, Kelvin is frozen for 500 years. When he awakens and goes to the surface, he is executed for causing World War Three.
ComicInfo.Tags: Dwight D. Eisenhower,North America,Satan,United States Army,Death,Nazis,Europe
ComicInfo.Title: Deliver Me from D-Day; The Stand-in
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
